overview: Gina B & Peaches play the matchmaker in their latest offering from the Lesbians at Home Collection. Nine of their sexiest Hungarian honeys are selected to preform a plethora of hot sapphic scenes. Revel in Cindy Hope's youthful beauty, Dorothy Black's fabulous tits and the gorgeous Madison Parker along with six other horny babes, lusting for lesbian love.
title: Our Legacy
